q: New` American Idol' judge Steven Tyler 's energy sets him apart from sometimes icy Simon Cowell Steven Tyler , Jennifer Lopez and Randy Jackson are the`` American Idol'' judges. The 10th season begins at 8 tonight on Fox. Darlings, how are you? This was Steven Tyler 's opening for the recent media conference call he did to plug his new gig as an`` American Idol'' judge. That's what we did, just dug deep and came up with some stops down the stretch. Richard Hamilton scored 24 points and Allen Iverson added 23 as the Pistons won for the second straight Aviciie to open their four-game road trip after losing their first two games with Allen Iverson .
